# Quickstart

Get started with Momentum in minutes!

## 1. Add a Task
Create your first task:

```bash
momentum add "Write documentation for Momentum"
```

## 2. View Status
See your current active task:

```bash
momentum status
```

## 3. Complete a Task
Mark your active task as done:

```bash
momentum done
```

## 4. Use the Backlog
Add a future task to your backlog:

```bash
momentum backlog add "Plan next sprint"
```

List your backlog:

```bash
momentum backlog list
```

## 5. Get Help
See all available commands:

```bash
momentum --help
```

You're ready to start tracking tasks with Momentum!
